1.title: I'm Not Ready for This
1.plot: It's back to school time for the McGhees, which means back to school shopping for clothes and supplies... times six! The sextuplets are excited, but how will they feel when the find out they will be repeating Kindergarten?

2.title: If You See Me Praying, You Know Why
2.plot: Mia and Ro decide it's time for the kids to say goodbye to their training wheels once and for all. But how do you teach six kids to ride a bike at once?

3.title: Apple Bruisers and Abusers
3.plot: While Ro works, Mia decides to take the kids apple picking and then bake a pie. But with six kids and one adult, will it be delicious or will Ro come home to a baking disaster?

4.title: You Just Touched Poop
4.plot: The McGhees prepare for Halloween. Ro is at the pumpkin patch hoping not to lose any of the kids before Mia returns. The sextuplets take their first crack at carving pumpkins.

5.title: Natural Born Band
5.plot: With sextuplets, the kids always have built-in playmates, but it's hard to give them the chance to express themselves individually. Mia & Ro want to find out who has a talent and interest in music, so they take everyone to their first lesson. Later, they host a playdate for the girls and let the boys go to a friend's house alone for the first time.

6.title: It's Thanksgiving, Not Thanks-taking
6.plot: November is a busy month for the McGhee family: birthdays, anniversaries and, of course, Thanksgiving! Everyone is ready to celebrate, but Madison makes some poor choices and brings the festivities to a halt. Will she redeem herself in time for Turkey Day?

7.title: Ro and His Crazy Ideas
7.plot: It's Christmas time in the McGhee household! Mia and Ro decide the kids need a lesson in giving, so they arrange a secret Santa gift exchange for the family. But keeping secrets isn't easy for six 6-year olds, and neither is buying toys for someone else! Will the holidays go off without a hitch, or will it be a multiples mess?

8.title: I Don't Know If IWant to Laugh or Cry
8.plot: Finding a balance in life with six kids is hard and Mia can't remember when she last went out alone. She decides to take some time for herself and have a night out with a girlfriend, while Ro takes the kids to work. The next day Mia and Ro take the sextuplets to an art class, but can the kids redeem themselves after the disaster of letting them help paint the house?

9.title: More Must See Moments
9.plot: A special episode of Growing Up McGhee with highlights of never-before-seen footage, bloopers, blunders, and a first look at Ro and Mia's wedding vow renewal.

10.title: Turks and Caicos Here We Come
10.plot: Mia & Ro got married at the courthouse when they were 18 and 19 years old - but always dreamed of having a real wedding. Well, after 17 years they feel it's time to have a grown-up wedding that includes their 6 kids. Pack your bags kids, the McGhees are heading to Turks and Caicos for the ultimate destination wedding!

11.title: 6 Kids and 17 Years Later
11.plot: The big day is here! Mia and the girls, her Daughter maids, have a morning of pampering and beautifying, while Ro's Best Boys take him out for the bachelor party he never had! Later, they all gather on the beach for an emotion-filled vow renewal before dancing and dining together to celebrate the love they have as a family!

1.title: Going a McGhee a Minute
1.plot: UP presents Growing Up McGhee. The McGhee sextuplets are now five, and they are forming their own interests, opinions and personalities, which is making life interesting for mom, Mia, and Dad, Ro.

2.title: Zone Defense at the Water Park
2.plot: UP presents Growing Up McGhee. When you have six kids cooped up in the middle of winter, a lot of energy gets built up. The McGhees plan a trip to the indoor water park.

3.title: Make Pizza, Not War
3.plot: UP presents Growing Up McGhee. It's Valentine's Day and at the McGhee household, six kids means six times the love. Ro uses this day to teach his boys how to treat the ladies in their lives.

4.title: Smooth As Cilky
4.plot: UP presents Growing Up McGhee. With Mia and Ro on a cruise to recharge their batteries, it's up to Grandma Cilky and Aunt Boogie to take care of the brood.

5.title: Adding Two to the Brood?!?!
5.plot: It's time the kids learn some responsibility, so Mia and Ro agree to try a family pet. After a trial run at home with a stuffed animal, it's off to the pet store!

6.title: Divide & Conquer
6.plot: Mia and Ro plan a special day where the boys get to spend it with mom and the girls get to go with dad. Mia wonders if she bit off more than she can chew, while Ro gets a day of pampering with the girls.

7.title: Team McGhee Takes the Field
7.plot: Spring has sprung, and so has the energy of the little McGhee's! Mia and Ro sign them up for their first team sport - soccer! The coach won't know what hit him...

8.title: Must See Moments
8.plot: A special episode of Growing Up McGhee with highlights of never-before-seen footage, bloopers, blunders, and an intimate conversation with parents Mia and Ro.

9.title: Poof Goes Vacation
9.plot: It's Spring Break and the kids earned enough poof-balls for a family vacation! They decide to head to the hills of Tennessee. But rounding up six kids for a road-trip means they'll need a vacation to recover from this one!

10.title: The S'more the Merrier
10.plot: In Tennessee for Spring Break, Ro hopes to show his kids some of his favorite pastimes - camping and fishing. Six kids with sharp hooks flying around doesn't sound like a bad idea, does it?

11.title: Six Turn Six
11.plot: The McGhee sextuplets are turning six! And what better way to celebrate the circus that is their life than with a carnival themed party for the kids and their friends

imdb.plot outline: After a decade of trying to have children, Mia and Ro McGhee never imagined that they would have sextuplets! In the new series, Growing Up McGhee, Mia and Ro try their best to balance a hectic life that not only includes raising six children, but also entails running a family business. Life was busy enough when they were babies, but now they can walk, talk, share lots of laughs and mischief.
imdb.title: Growing Up McGhee
plot: After a decade of trying to have children, Mia and Ro McGhee never imagined that they would have sextuplets! In the new series, _Growing Up McGhee_ (qv), Mia and Ro try their best to balance a hectic life that not only includes raising six children, but also entails running a family business. Life was busy enough when they were babies, but now they can walk, talk, share lots of laughs and mischief.
